about_the_game: Show your colours with this exclusive, money can’t buy (because it’s free!), Alienware livery for the Cygon Eversor. Once activated you can find this skin in the ‘Paint’ section of the Garage, and share your ride on social media with #GottaDriveEmAll!
detailed_description:
WISHLIST MEOW! 😻


About the Game

Show your colours with this exclusive, money can’t buy (because it’s free!), Alienware livery for the Cygon Eversor. Once activated you can find this skin in the ‘Paint’ section of the Garage, and share your ride on social media with #GottaDriveEmAll!
legal_notice: GRIP © 2019 Caged Element Inc. Published by Wired Productions Ltd and developed by Caged Element. GRIP and the GRIP logo are trademarks of Caged Element.  All rights reserved.
name: GRIP: Combat Racing - Alienware Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 or Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970 or Radeon 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.

short_description: Show your colours with this exclusive, money can’t buy (because it’s free!), Alienware livery for the Cygon Eversor. Once activated you can find this skin in the ‘Paint’ section of the Garage, and share your ride on social media with #GottaDriveEmAll!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian
